20110108040132.000|20110108040136.000|CC1|>>> IN SOUTHERN ALABAMA, THE    
20110108040136.000|20110108040138.000|CC1|HOLMAN CORRECTIONAL FACILITY    
20110108040138.000|20110108040142.000|CC1|HOUSES SOME OF THE STATE'S MOST 
20110108040142.000|20110108040144.000|CC1|DANGEROUS CRIMINALS.            
20110108040144.000|20110108040146.000|CC1|AMBULANCES WERE OFTEN SEEN      
20110108040146.000|20110108040147.000|CC1|COMING TO AND FROM THE PRISON.  
20110108040147.000|20110108040149.000|CC1|IN RECENT YEARS, THE NUMBER OF  
20110108040149.000|20110108040152.000|CC1|SERIOUS INCIDENTS HAS BEEN      
20110108040152.000|20110108040152.000|CC1|REDUCED, PARTLY BECAUSE OF      
20110108040152.000|20110108040154.000|CC1|STRICT POLICY CHANGES AND THE   
20110108040154.000|20110108040200.000|CC1|SUPERVISION OF A NEW WARDEN.    
20110108040200.000|20110108040201.000|CC1|THE FARM LAND OUTSIDE ATWOOD,   
20110108040201.000|20110108040202.000|CC1|ALABAMA, LOOKS MUCH THE SAME AS 
20110108040202.000|20110108040204.000|CC1|IT DID IN 1969.                 
20110108040204.000|20110108040206.000|CC1|THAT WAS THE YEAR HOLMAN        
20110108040206.000|20110108040210.000|CC1|CORRECTIONAL FACILITY, ONE OF   
20110108040210.000|20110108040212.000|CC1|ALABAMA'S MAXIMUM SECURITY      
20110108040212.000|20110108040216.000|CC1|PRISONS OPENED ITS GATES.       
20110108040216.000|20110108040218.000|CC1|ALL OF ALABAMA'S EXECUTIONS ARE 
20110108040218.000|20110108040222.000|CC1|CARRIED OUT HERE.               
20110108040222.000|20110108040223.000|CC1|THE PRISON WAS ORIGINALLY BUILT 
20110108040223.000|20110108040224.000|CC1|TO HOUSE 540 INMATES.           
20110108040224.000|20110108040227.000|CC1|TODAY, THAT POPULATION IS NEARLY
20110108040227.000|20110108040230.000|CC1|DOUBLED AND MOST INMATES,       
20110108040230.000|20110108040231.000|CC1|INCLUDING SERIOUS FELONS, LIVE  
20110108040231.000|20110108040236.000|CC1|IN ONE OF FIVE OPEN DORMITORIES.
20110108040236.000|20110108040238.000|CC1|>> I'VE BEEN LOCKED UP 12 YEARS 
20110108040238.000|20110108040239.000|CC1|AND IT'S NOT GETTING ANY BETTER 
20110108040239.000|20110108040241.000|CC1|IN HERE.                        
20110108040241.000|20110108040242.000|CC1|INSTEAD THEY TRY TO PILE US IN, 
20110108040242.000|20110108040243.000|CC1|PILE US IN MORE AND MORE.       
20110108040243.000|20110108040244.000|CC1|>> AT HOLMAN, 630 BEDS ARE      
20110108040244.000|20110108040248.000|CC1|DEDICATED TO GENERAL POPULATION.
20110108040248.000|20110108040249.000|CC1|200 ACCOMMODATE INMATES IN      
20110108040249.000|20110108040251.000|CC1|ADMINISTRATIVE SEGREGATION.     
20110108040251.000|20110108040254.000|CC1|AND 172 ARE SET ASIDE FOR DEATH 
20110108040254.000|20110108040255.000|CC1|ROW INMATES.                    
20110108040255.000|20110108040257.000|CC1|>> YOU HAVE ANYTHING FROM A

20110108040307.000|20110108040315.000|CC1|INMATES OR INMATES THAT OTHER   
20110108040315.000|20110108040316.000|CC1|CAMPS CAN'T CONTAIN, THEY WILL  
20110108040316.000|20110108040318.000|CC1|SEND THEM TO US AND WE TAKE THEM
20110108040318.000|20110108040323.000|CC1|AND WE'LL DEAL WITH THEM.       
20110108040323.000|20110108040327.000|CC1|>> GET TIED UP, GET SHOT UP,    
20110108040327.000|20110108040329.000|CC1|PEOPLE CAN GET STABBED UP.      
20110108040329.000|20110108040331.000|CC1|>> WRONG PLACE, WRONG TIME,     
20110108040331.000|20110108040331.000|CC1|MIGHT GET HURT.                 
20110108040331.000|20110108040332.000|CC1|>> SO, UP TO YOU TO MAINTAIN AND
20110108040332.000|20110108040333.000|CC1|WE, YOU KNOW WHAT I'M SAYING,   
20110108040333.000|20110108040335.000|CC1|YOU CAN'T WE, YOU GOING TO BE

20110108040540.000|20110108040541.000|CC1|SOMETHING AND FILE IT DOWN ON   
20110108040541.000|20110108040546.000|CC1|THE CONCRETE.

20110108040619.000|20110108040620.000|CC1|>> GILBERT HAS ATTACKED SEVERAL 
20110108040620.000|20110108040621.000|CC1|PRISONERS AND STABBED ONE MAN TO

20110108040628.000|20110108040629.000|CC1|SOMEBODY OVER A CARTON OF       
20110108040629.000|20110108040630.000|CC1|CIGARETTES.                     
20110108040630.000|20110108040633.000|CC1|IT'S NOT A CARTON OF CIGARETTES.
20110108040633.000|20110108040638.000|CC1|THAT MAY BE THE CATALYST THAT   
20110108040638.000|20110108040642.000|CC1|LEADS TO SOMETHING, BUT IF      
20110108040642.000|20110108040644.000|CC1|SOMEBODY OWES ME A SODA POP AND 
20110108040644.000|20110108040647.000|CC1|THEY COME TO ME AND SAY, HEY,

20110108040653.000|20110108040654.000|CC1|THEY'RE A BITCH OR SOMETHING,   
20110108040654.000|20110108040654.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, AND THEN THEY KILL ME,
20110108040654.000|20110108040655.000|CC1|WHOSE FAULT IS IT?

20110108040656.000|20110108040657.000|CC1|MORE.

20110108040658.000|20110108040659.000|CC1|POLICE TO PUT A STOP TO IT.     
20110108040659.000|20110108040700.000|CC1|WHAT DO YOU DO IN HERE?

20110108040701.000|20110108040702.000|CC1|YOU GO GET YOU A KNIFE AND YOU  
20110108040702.000|20110108040703.000|CC1|STAB THAT SON OF A BITCH AND SAY

20110108040707.000|20110108040707.000|CC1|THAT.

20110108040709.000|20110108040712.000|CC1|COME TO TAKE SOMETHING FROM ME. 
20110108040712.000|20110108040714.000|CC1|98% OF THESE SON OF A BITCHES IN
20110108040714.000|20110108040715.000|CC1|HERE OUGHT TO BE TAKEN OUT

20110108040719.000|20110108040720.000|CC1|OF THE HEAD.                    
20110108040720.000|20110108040728.000|CC1|MAYBE I'M PART OF THAT 98%.     
20110108040728.000|20110108040729.000|CC1|>> AT HOLMAN, INMATES LIKE BOBBY
20110108040729.000|20110108040730.000|CC1|GILBERT WHO COMMIT A VIOLENT ACT
20110108040730.000|20110108040733.000|CC1|ARE SENT TO ADMINISTRATIVE      
20110108040733.000|20110108040738.000|CC1|SEGREGATION OR SEG.             
20110108040738.000|20110108040743.000|CC1|HERE, THEY SPEND 23 HOURS A DAY 
20110108040743.000|20110108040748.000|CC1|IN SOLITARY CONFINEMENT.        
20110108040748.000|20110108040750.000|CC1|>> IN SEG, THEY CAN'T SMOKE.    
20110108040750.000|20110108040751.000|CC1|THEY CAN'T BE OUT WITHOUT BEING 
20110108040751.000|20110108040753.000|CC1|HANDCUFFED.                     
20110108040753.000|20110108040753.000|CC1|THEY HAVE TO HAVE SOMEONE ESCORT
20110108040753.000|20110108040754.000|CC1|THEM EVERYWHERE THEY GO.        
20110108040754.000|20110108040755.000|CC1|>> TREATING ME LIKE I'M AN      
20110108040755.000|20110108040756.000|CC1|ANIMAL.                         
20110108040756.000|20110108040757.000|CC1|I AIN'T NO ANIMAL.              
20110108040757.000|20110108040758.000|CC1|I'M A HUMAN BEING LIKE ANYBODY  
20110108040758.000|20110108040759.000|CC1|IN THIS WORLD.                  
20110108040759.000|20110108040801.000|CC1|>> I THINK THE IDEA OF IT IS A  
20110108040801.000|20110108040801.000|CC1|DETERRENT, TO KEEP -- TO MAKE   
20110108040801.000|20110108040803.000|CC1|THEM WANT TO DO RIGHT, SO MAYBE 
20110108040803.000|20110108040804.000|CC1|THEY SPEND A LITTLE TIME BACK   
20110108040804.000|20110108040805.000|CC1|HERE IN THE SINGLE-CELL LOCKUP, 
20110108040805.000|20110108040806.000|CC1|THEY MIGHT WANT TO GET OUT AND  
20110108040806.000|20110108040807.000|CC1|DO BETTER AND DO THE RIGHT      
20110108040807.000|20110108040813.000|CC1|THING.                          
20110108040813.000|20110108040814.000|CC1|>> DEPENDING ON THE OFFENSE,    
20110108040814.000|20110108040815.000|CC1|TIME SPENT IN SEG CAN BE        
20110108040815.000|20110108040817.000|CC1|ANYWHERE FROM 90 DAYS TO AN     
20110108040817.000|20110108040819.000|CC1|INDEFINITE PERIOD OF TIME.      
20110108040819.000|20110108040821.000|CC1|>> I'M IN LOCKUP BECAUSE I      
20110108040821.000|20110108040821.000|CC1|ESCAPED ABOUT SIX YEARS AGO.    
20110108040821.000|20110108040822.000|CC1|THEY AIN'T TOLD ME WHETHER      
20110108040822.000|20110108040823.000|CC1|THEY'RE GOING TO LET ME OUT OR  
20110108040823.000|20110108040824.000|CC1|NOT.                            
20110108040824.000|20110108040826.000|CC1|IT'S BEEN ALMOST SIX YEARS IN A 
20110108040826.000|20110108040829.000|CC1|ONE-MAN CELL.                   
20110108040829.000|20110108040830.000|CC1|>> SEG TIME IS WORSE DURING AN  
20110108040830.000|20110108040832.000|CC1|ALABAMA SUMMER, WHEN            
20110108040832.000|20110108040834.000|CC1|TEMPERATURES INSIDE THE CELLS   
20110108040834.000|20110108040836.000|CC1|CAN BECOME EXTREMELY HOT.       
20110108040836.000|20110108040838.000|CC1|>> TREMENDOUSLY HOT.            
20110108040838.000|20110108040840.000|CC1|AND IT GETS WRITTEN UP.         
20110108040840.000|20110108040842.000|CC1|THE BEST YOU CAN DO IS GET TWO  
20110108040842.000|20110108040847.000|CC1|OR THREE HOURS OF SLEEP EARLY IN
20110108040847.000|20110108040849.000|CC1|THE MORNING TIME, AND THEN AFTER
20110108040849.000|20110108040850.000|CC1|THAT, JUST GET UP AND PACE THE  
20110108040850.000|20110108040853.000|CC1|FLOOR AND TRY TO GET COOLED OFF 
20110108040853.000|20110108040854.000|CC1|THE BEST WAY YOU CAN.           
20110108040854.000|20110108040856.000|CC1|>> ONE OF THE INMATES HERE IS   
20110108040856.000|20110108040858.000|CC1|STEVEN PARKER, A SELF-PROCLAIMED
20110108040858.000|20110108040859.000|CC1|SHOT CALLER IN THE ARYAN        
20110108040859.000|20110108040900.000|CC1|BROTHERHOOD GANG.

20110108045221.000|20110108045221.000|CC1|     cause pressure points
